articles.title: Google saves your conversations with Gemini for years by default - TechCrunch
articles.description: In its privacy policy, Google reveals that it stores convos with its AI-powered Gemini apps for three years by default.
articles.content:
Don’t type anything into Gemini, Google’s family of GenAI apps, that’s incriminating — or that you wouldn’t want someone else to see.
